mapper.insert: INSERT INTO home_loan_base (kind, pIndex, fin_co_no, kor_co_nm, fin_prdt_cd, fin_prdt_nm, join_way, loan_inci_expn, erly_rpay_fee, dly_rate, loan_lmt) VALUES (#{kind}, #{pIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{kor_co_nm}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{fin_prdt_nm}, #{join_way}, #{loan_inci_expn}, #{erly_rpay_fee}, #{dly_rate}, #{loan_lmt})

INSERT INTO home_loan_option (oIndex, fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, mrtg_type, mrtg_type_nm, rpay_type, rpay_type_nm, lend_rate_type, lend_rate_type_nm, lend_rate_min, lend_rate_max, lend_rate_avg) VALUES (#{oIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{mrtg_type}, #{mrtg_type_nm}, #{rpay_type}, #{rpay_type_nm}, #{lend_rate_type}, #{lend_rate_type_nm}, #{lend_rate_min}, #{lend_rate_max}, #{lend_rate_avg})

INSERT INTO charter_loan_base (kind, pIndex, fin_co_no, kor_co_nm, fin_prdt_cd, fin_prdt_nm, join_way, loan_inci_expn, erly_rpay_fee, dly_rate, loan_lmt) VALUES (#{kind}, #{pIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{kor_co_nm}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{fin_prdt_nm}, #{join_way}, #{loan_inci_expn}, #{erly_rpay_fee}, #{dly_rate}, #{loan_lmt})

INSERT INTO charter_loan_option (oIndex, fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, rpay_type, rpay_type_nm, lend_rate_type, lend_rate_type_nm, lend_rate_min, lend_rate_max, lend_rate_avg) VALUES (#{oIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{rpay_type}, #{rpay_type_nm}, #{lend_rate_type}, #{lend_rate_type_nm}, #{lend_rate_min}, #{lend_rate_max}, #{lend_rate_avg})

INSERT INTO personal_loan_base (kind, pIndex, fin_co_no, kor_co_nm, fin_prdt_cd, fin_prdt_nm, join_way, crdt_prdt_type, crdt_prdt_type_nm, cb_name) VALUES (#{kind}, #{pIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{kor_co_nm}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{fin_prdt_nm}, #{join_way}, #{crdt_prdt_type}, #{crdt_prdt_type_nm}, #{cb_name})

INSERT INTO personal_loan_option (oIndex, fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, crdt_prdt_type, crdt_lend_rate_type, crdt_lend_rate_type_nm, crdt_grad_1, crdt_grad_4, crdt_grad_5, crdt_grad_6, crdt_grad_10, crdt_grad_11, crdt_grad_12, crdt_grad_13, crdt_grad_avg) VALUES (#{oIndex}, #{fin_co_no}, #{fin_prdt_cd}, #{crdt_prdt_type}, #{crdt_lend_rate_type}, #{crdt_lend_rate_type_nm}, #{crdt_grad_1}, #{crdt_grad_4}, #{crdt_grad_5}, #{crdt_grad_6}, #{crdt_grad_10}, #{crdt_grad_11}, #{crdt_grad_12}, #{crdt_grad_13}, #{crdt_grad_avg})
